caption.p: Comparison of the total cover of plants (COVER), species richness (S), Shannon-Wiener index (H’) and evenness index (E); Ellenberg indicators for light (L), temperature (T), and moisture (F); soil characteristics for phosphorus (P), and floatable parts (FL), among study sites. R—reference site, adjacent forest, SH—sand heaps, ST—sandy bottom of sedimentation tank, WT—wetlands. Significance of the differences according to the Fisher-Pitman test *— p < 0.05; **— p < 0.01, ***— p < 0.001. The same lowercase letters indicate no significant difference.
